channel.title: Quick Delta question
channel.description: I was wondering if it was possible to let's say type 100k in a shop or something and it would equal 100,000? And if there is a way could some nice person point me in the right direction :P It's been a while.

item.title: Quick Delta question
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

See I’ve already added a little snip that helps players see how much an item is if ((ShopValue >= 1000) && (ShopValue < 1000000)) { ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000) + "K)"; } else if (ShopValue >= 1000000) { ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000000) + " million)"; I just created a little automated gambling system and it would be so much easier to type 100k or 10m or whatever the amount was like that instead of 100000 and so on.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Delta question
item.dc:creator: @Ambition_Rsps Ambition Rsps
item.description:
@Ambition_Rsps wrote:

it depends on the server, many of them yes you can do 100k sometimes it needs to be 100g (100 grand) but to be on the safe side i would stick with (100,000) its much more easy. but yes it should work. unless its Dragon History that source it would not.

Read full topic
